titleStmt.title: The way to thrive: or The heavenly thrift. Teaching a man so to thrive heere, that he may thrive for ever hereafter. By Alexander Mingzeis, minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Mingzeis, Alexander.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, M DC L III. [1653]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
